Saltaire, West Yorkshire, UK. PHP devs wanted (FULL-TIME, ON-SITE) ... by fleetondemand.com, a funded start-up developing web apps for the business fleet/motor industry

What we're mostly looking for: - experience in OO PHP, mySQL and modern javascript use (we use jQuery) - team worker, appreciative of customers and users

Any of this would be a bonus: - strong cross browser/device HTML&CSS - experience in Apache administration, mod_rewrite etc - familiarity with version control - linux sysadmin - web design & illustration skills

Joining our dev team, you'd be contributing to current and future work: - extending functionality on our app; from the system model, through to page builds and testing - using and contributing to our in-house MVC framework - communicating with 3rd party systems using existing APIs or bespoke mechanisms - benchmarking, scalability and penetration testing - scalability solutions (caching, DB replication, load balancing, noSQL, ....?)

Interested? Want to know more? Hey, where do I send my CV? danm@fleetondemand.com
